bookAuthors: Jeph Loeb, Jim Lee, Scott Williams
Plot: BATMAN: HUSH is a thrilling mystery of action, intrigue, and deception penned by Jeph Loeb (BATMAN: THE LONG HALLOWEEN) and illustrated by comics superstar Jim Lee (ALL STAR BATMAN & ROBIN, THE BOY WONDER) in which Batman sets out to discover the identity of a mysterious mastermind using the Joker, Riddler, Ra's al Ghul and the Dark Knight's other enemies - and allies - as pawns in a plan to wreak havoc. Volume 2 is collecting Batman #613 - #619.
Characters: Dick Grayson, Harvey Dent, Ra's al Ghul, Alfred Pennyworth, Lex Luthor, Helena Bertinelli, Harley Quinn, Hush, Tim Drake, Jason Todd, Talia al Ghul, Jonathan Crane, James Gordon, Selina Kyle, Edward Nigma, Bruce Wayne, Joker, Superman
